text: kya tu nahi dekh raha ke, Allah ke saamne sajde mein hai sab asmaano waale aur sab zameeno waale aur suraj aur chaandh aur sitaare aur pahaad aur daraqth aur jaanwar aur bahuth se insaan bhi, haan bahuth se wo bhi hai jin par azaab ka maqula saabiath ho chuka hai, jise rab zaleel karde ose koyi izzath dene wala nahi, Allah jo chahta hai karta hai
